comment: We are already out of time. Unless a legitimate wall is built and the mass deportation of millions of invaders begin, all else will fail. By numbers alone, the native population will be a shadow of itself in very short course. Drastic action is required, or set sail back to the ether.
amr:
# ::snt We are already out of time. Unless a legitimate wall is built and the mass deportation of millions of invaders begin, all else will fail. By numbers alone, the native population will be a shadow of itself in very short course. Drastic action is required, or set sail back to the ether.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (o / out-06
            :ARG1 (w / we)
            :ARG2 (t / time)
            :time (a / already))
      :snt2 (f / fail-01
            :ARG1 (a2 / all
                  :mod (e / else))
            :condition (a3 / and
                  :op1 (b / build-01
                        :ARG1 (w2 / wall
                              :ARG1-of (l / legitimate-02)))
                  :op2 (b2 / begin-01
                        :ARG1 (d / deport-01
                              :ARG1 (p / person
                                    :quant (m2 / multiple
                                          :op1 1000000)
                                    :ARG0-of (ii / invade-01))
                              :manner (m3 / mass)))))
      :snt3 (s / shadow-01
            :ARG0 (p2 / population
                  :mod (n / native)
                  :ARG1-of s)
            :mod (c / course
                  :ARG1-of (s2 / short-07
                        :degree (v / very))
                  :mod (a4 / alone)))
      :snt4 (o2 / or
            :op1 (r / require-01
                  :ARG1 (a5 / act-02
                        :mod (m4 / medicine)))
            :op2 (s3 / set-
                  :ARG0 (s4 / sail-01)
                  :direction (b3 / back
                        :op1 (e2 / ether)))))
